abstract: Kisho Yano (矢野 貴章, Yano Kishō, born 5 April 1984 in Hamamatsu, Shizuoka) is a Japanese footballer who plays as a striker for Nagoya Grampus.
comment: Kisho Yano (矢野 貴章, Yano Kishō, born 5 April 1984 in Hamamatsu, Shizuoka) is a Japanese footballer who plays as a striker for Nagoya Grampus.
